name: MERIT AVIATION PTY LTD
about: Merit Aviation, based at the picturesque Moruya Airport on the NSW South Coast, offers bespoke flight training and breathtaking scenic flights. Our experienced instructors provide training for Recreational Pilot Licence (RPL), Private Pilot Licence (PPL), and Commercial Pilot Licence (CPL), as well as multi-engine, instrument rating, and instructor ratings. We also offer tailored training programs and various endorsements to enhance your skills. In addition to flight training, our scenic flights showcase the stunning NSW South Coast, including destinations like Batemans Bay, Montague Island, and Pigeon House Mountain. With a focus on personalized experiences, expert guidance, and comprehensive services, Merit Aviation is your gateway to the skies, ensuring an experience that soars beyond your expectations. Join us for an unforgettable aerial adventure.
services: ["Recreational Pilot Licence\nPrivate Pilot Licence\nCommercial Pilot Licence"]
